languages.text:
"...славит воителей Фенриса, гордую свору".
{n}Ульфар задумчиво повторяет ваши слова, а затем усмехается.{/n} "Неплохо сказано, {name}. В нашем, волчьем, духе".

"...the warriors of Fenris,
that proud litter extolling."
{n}Ulfar repeats your words thoughtfully, then grins.{/n} "Not bad, {name}. Spoken like a wolf."
languages.original_text:

languages.text:
“……芬里斯的勇士们，
高傲而荣耀的野狼。”
{n}乌尔法认真地重复着你的话，随后露出了笑容。{/n}“还不赖，{name}，听上去就像是狼一样。”
languages.original_text:
"...the warriors of Fenris,
that proud litter extolling."
{n}Ulfar repeats your words thoughtfully, then grins.{/n} "Not bad, {name}. Spoken like a wolf."

traits.locale_text:
“……芬里斯的勇士们，
高傲而荣耀的野狼。”
{n}乌尔法认真地重复着你的话，随后露出了笑容。{/n}“还不赖，{name}，听上去就像是狼一样。”
traits.speaker: UlfarCompanion

languages.text:
「…フェンリスの戦士、
同じ腹の子を誇る」
{n}ウルファーはあなたの言葉をかみ砕きながら繰り返すと、ニヤリと笑う。{/n}「悪くないな、{name}。狼のようじゃないか」
languages.original_text:
"...the warriors of Fenris,
that proud litter extolling."
{n}Ulfar repeats your words thoughtfully, then grins.{/n} "Not bad, {name}. Spoken like a wolf."

traits.locale_text:

同じ腹の子を誇る」
{n}ウルファーはあなたの言葉をかみ砕きながら繰り返すと、ニヤリと笑う。{/n}「悪くないな、{name}。狼のようじゃないか」
traits.speaker: UlfarCompanion

languages.text:
«... los guerreros de Fenris,
que enorgullecen la enaltecida camada».
{n}Ulfar repite tus palabras detenidamente y sonríe.{/n} «Nada mal, {name}. Lo ha dicho como un Lobo».
languages.original_text:
"...the warriors of Fenris,
that proud litter extolling."
{n}Ulfar repeats your words thoughtfully, then grins.{/n} "Not bad, {name}. Spoken like a wolf."

{n}Ulfar repite tus palabras detenidamente y sonríe.{/n} «Nada mal, {name}. Lo ha dicho como un Lobo».
traits.speaker: UlfarCompanion

languages.text:
« ... poussé par la fière meute
des guerriers de Fenris. »
{n}Ulfar répète ces vers pensivement, puis sourit.{/n} « Pas mal, {name}. Un Loup n'aurait pas dit mieux. »
languages.original_text:
"...the warriors of Fenris,
that proud litter extolling."
{n}Ulfar repeats your words thoughtfully, then grins.{/n} "Not bad, {name}. Spoken like a wolf."

traits.speaker: UlfarCompanion

languages.text:
"... als Lobpreisung
des stolzen Wurfs der Krieger von Fenris."
{n}Ulfar wiederholt deine Worte mit Bedacht und grinst.{/n} "Nicht schlecht, {name}. Gesprochen wie ein Wolf."
languages.original_text:
"...the warriors of Fenris,
that proud litter extolling."
{n}Ulfar repeats your words thoughtfully, then grins.{/n} "Not bad, {name}. Spoken like a wolf."

traits.locale_text:

{n}Ulfar wiederholt deine Worte mit Bedacht und grinst.{/n} "Nicht schlecht, {name}. Gesprochen wie ein Wolf."
traits.speaker: UlfarCompanion

languages.text:
"Fenris'in savaşçıları,
O gururlu yavru yüceldi."
{n}Ulfar, sözlerini nazikçe tekrarlayıp gülümsüyor.{/n} "Hiç fena değil {name}. Bir kurda yaraşır şekilde okudun."
languages.original_text:
"...the warriors of Fenris,
that proud litter extolling."
{n}Ulfar repeats your words thoughtfully, then grins.{/n} "Not bad, {name}. Spoken like a wolf."

traits.speaker: UlfarCompanion
